item.title: 🏆 Young Researcher Presentation Award
item.description: I was honored to receive the 11th Young Researcher Presentation Award from the for my presentation, “A Proposal of Selection Guideline for Geographical SMR Protocols Using Communication Pattern-based Response Time Models,” at held at Hakodate Arena from August 2 to August 4, 2023. This award recognizes outstanding presentations by researchers under the age of 33 during conferences held between June 1 and May 31 of the following year.

item.title: 🏆 Outstanding Presentation Award
item.description: I received the Outstanding Presentation Award for my presentation, “ネットワーク測定に基づくRaft選挙パラメータの動的最適化 (Dynamic Optimization of Raft Election Parameters Based on Network Measurements),” at the held at Nagoya Institute of Technology from September 1 to September 3, 2024.

item.title: 💵 Grant: Toyohashi University of Technology Overseas Trainee Scholarship
item.description: I participated in a training program in Malaysia through the at Toyohashi University of Technology from January 4 to February 25, 2023.
